entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dot net MAUI does not support iOS 18.3.1 #28020
  • pdf is not scroll in webview maui iOS #28017
  • The header in a collectionview does not resize if you hide the content #28012
    Backlog
  • Some XAML properties (i.e. `DatePicker.Date`) give false positives when using nullable types #28010
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Remove Android API check for device test results #28007
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Windows] ScrollPosition changes while inserting an item into CollectionView. #28006
  • [iOS] Wrong TimePicker black bar #27999
    Backlog
  • [Windows] ScrollView is not scrolling to the bottom if in grid with *,auto Width #27998
    Backlog
  • Wrong filename from MediaPicker.Default.PickPhotoAsync #27996
    Backlog
  • The path 'XXXXXXX\Shared\MainLayout.razor.css' would result in a file outside of the app bundle and cannot be used like Issue #406 #27994
  • Entry Completed Event Triggered Twice #27992
    Backlog

Closed

  • [net10.0] macOS Controls devices tests won't run #27736
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Android] Navigation/Layout performance issue #4149
  • Icon tab menu navigation don´t change #10205
  • Migrated Xamarin Form Application To MAUI, But Now Facing Memory Leaks, Slower App and ANR issues #28008
  • FilePicker doesn't take into account IsExternalStorageManager #6015
    Backlog
  • [IOS] [Mac] Page OnAppearing Is Not Triggered When Navigating Multiple Levels Deep and Returning with PopToRootAsync #27897
    Backlog
  • When pressing Tab, Drawing Control does not get focus on Mac #27997
  • [iOS] CollectionView 1's doesn't adjust its offset when resizing a footer #27962
  • .NET MAUI IOS Collection view selection colour is Grey when we navigate to other page and come back again. #27945
  • [iOS] CV1's footer doesn't increase its size #27978
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Implement TimePicker.ClockIdentifier #441
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] support Length Units such like `px` `rpx` `vw` `vh` #1295
    Backlog
  • ImageSource is not work when set Image.Source to file in external storage #6525
    Backlog
  • Android app showed a black screen #27983
  • Popup allows background interactions in .NET MAUI but not in Xamarin #27740

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix: Prevent duplicate Completed event when setting ReturnType in Entry #28018
    community ✨
  • [ci] Publish workload VS insertion zips #28016
    area-infrastructure
  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #28015
    t/app-size, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [iOS] Make sure the Window is available #28013
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 17 #28011
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the shape rendering issue when the IsVisible property changes #28002
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Button rendering overflow in StackLayout #28001
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix flaky UITests 7 #28000
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • Add test run message to device tests logs #27993
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] CollectionView with grouped data crashes on iOS when the groups change - fix #27991
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 9 #27743
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling ContextMenu UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 2 #27405
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Android device tests on .NET 10 #28009
    platform/android 🤖, area-infrastructure, area-testing, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 14 #27906
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 2 #27500
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Enable generation of API docs in CI for .NET 10 #28004
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 11064473 #27982
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Set `UseRidGraph=false` on Windows (attempt 2) #27679
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [net10] Update aspnet as sdk, enable Blazor tests #27796
  • [Android] Properly Resolve File Paths in FilePicker When MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is Granted #27975
    area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-file-picker, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enable the Issue417 test on iOS and Catalyst #27987
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-navigation, area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27986
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] CollectionView 1's doesn't adjust its offset when resizing a footer #27963
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] CV1's footer doesn't increase its size - fix #27979
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, area-keyboard
  • [android] move `IsDispatchRequiredImplementation()` to Java #27936
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 16 #27968
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-gestures
  • Fix the FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync() Not Returning Null When Canceled #27961
    area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Make ShadowTypeConverter public & nullable for .NET 10 #27984
    t/breaking 💥, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [iOS] Fix for TableView cells become empty after adding a new cell with context actions #26326
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabbedPage - ScrollView not allowing scrolling when it should #26217
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android/iOS] Fix IsEnabled=False on CollectionView not working #27749
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix Indicator View Causing Looping Issue with CarouselView #27880
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-gestures
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-drawing, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] try do full build on dnceng #27456
    area-infrastructure
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, stale, .NET 10 Planning
  • [Windows] Fixed Shadow not updated when Clipping a View with a shadow #27873
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Slider Control #27433
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed an issue where an Editor with a small height inside a ScrollView would cause the entire page to scroll #27948
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed ScrollView Orientation Neither issue #27231
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Windows] Fix "PlatformView cannot be null here" Exception using VisualStates #27877
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟
  • Fixed - Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #27847
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Empty View Overlapping Header in CollectionView with CollectionViewHandler2 #27988
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Empowering UITests with AI #27929
    do-not-merge, area-testing, area-ai
  • [Android] Shell Navigation to a page without a Tabbar #27779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail. #27453
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 3 #27905
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 1 #26696

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
